span.h4: The Use of Property Request form can now be completed online. Please click on the link below to open the form. Please e-mail the form to tvalicenti@eawildcats.net or fax to 412-824-1062.

a.title: Go to comments for Use of Property Requests - Form

span.h4: The East Allegheny School District is now accepting payment for school taxes via credit card. Please click here to access the system from

a.title: Go to comments for On-Line Tax Payment System

h4.span: Keystone Collections Group has a phone line dedicated exclusively to taxpayer inquiries during the tax filing season.
Please click here for additional information.

p.span: FILE YOUR LOCAL TAX RETURN ONLINE

h4.span: Please click here for additional information.

a.title: Go to comments for Keystone Collections Information

span.h4: We are pleased to announce the creation of the STEM Club at the JSHS. Please click on the link below for their website:

a.title: Go to comments for STEM Club

span.div: If your student attends a cyber, brick/mortar charter school, private or parochial school A Charter School Enrollment notification form is needed from the Charter school or the Transportation Registration Form can be completed and and provided to our registrar. For hours and more information click here.

h3.strong: Returning students must verify their address and phone number with the registrar before August 1.

a.title: Go to comments for Registration Required-for outside school placement

span.h4: Please visit "For Parents" on the menu bar for information on several topics of interest including CADA programs, registration and volunteering at EASD.

em.span: The East Allegheny School District, in partnerships with families and the community, responsibly engages, inspires and prepares each student for individual success, citizenship and life in the 21st century.
